data.title: The Joker Is Wild Original 1957 U.S. One Sheet Movie Poster
data.meta_description: Original 1957 U.S. one sheet poster for the film The Joker Is Wild directed by Charles Vidor with Frank Sinatra / Mitzi Gaynor / Jeanne Crain / Eddie Albert.
